titleStmt.title: The doctrine of the covenant of redemption Wherein is laid the foundation of all our hopes and happiness. Briefly opened and improved. By Samuel Willard, teacher of a church in Boston. [Three lines from Psalms]
titleStmt.author: Willard, Samuel, 1640-1707.
Mather, Increase, 1639-1723.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Benj. Harris over against the [Old-Meet]ing-House,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: lacks errata and all after page 158, and title page is damaged, affecting imprint.
Reproduction of original in the John Carter Brown Library.
